alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued January 21 at 3:43PM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Sneaker waves possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Waves can run up significantly farther on a beach than normal, including over rocks and jetties. Sneaker waves can suddenly knock people off of their feet and quickly pull them into the frigid ocean which may lead to serious injury or drowning.
info.instruction: Sneaker waves can run up on the beach, lifting or rolling large heavy water soaked logs which can lead to serious injury or death. Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
